title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XXV, pt. 1030 - Requirements For The Operation Of Drug-free Substance Abuse Programs
content:

State Regulations
§ 1030.1 - Residential drug-free treatment services
§ 1030.2 - Ambulatory drug-free prevention services
§ 1030.3 - Drug-free prevention services

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XXV, pt. 1030

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§19.05[f], 19.07[b], 23.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
